titles.title: Strengthening Housing Supply Act of 2022
Strengthening Housing Supply Act of 2022
To authorize affordable housing construction as an eligible activity under the Community Development Block Grant Program, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.

bill.summary:
Strengthening Housing Supply Act of 2022
This bill includes the construction of affordable housing as an allowable use of the Community Development Block Grant (federal assistance for states and local governments to support neighborhood revitalization, housing rehabilitation, and community economic development efforts).
